package.name: slisearch
package.summary: LSC integrates Magento with SLI's SaaS based Learning Search, Learning Navigation and user based SEO products.
package.description:
Learning Search Connect (LSC) produces data feeds out of current Magento Community and Enterprise editions. The feeds are created and then sent to SLI's FTP servers for further processing.

Any information required to power SLI's SaaS based product family is contained in the feed.

Other than feed creation LSC provides the following features:

  • When active it replaces the Magento built in Catalog Search with SLI-Systems' award winning Learning Search. Your site visitors on entering search terms will be served search results that were created by SLI-Systems.
  • It exposes a URL to the Magento site's template page so that SLI's search results page can be styled to exactly match your Magento implementation's look and feel.

    • The data in the feed can be used for the following SLI products and services:
  • Learning Search for eCommerce Retail Sites
  • Learning Navigation for eCommerce Retail Sites
  • Site Champion: User-Generated SEO
  • Site Search for Mobile Devices
  • 24x7 support 
  • Other features include:
    • SLI Merchandising
    • Conversion Optimizer for A/B and Multivariate Testing
    • Comprehensive reporting system
    • Rich Auto Complete
    • AJAX search
    • Learning Search Connect has the following capabilities
    • Store specific feeds
    • Optional separate price feed in case advanced price finding mechanisms (such as catalog price rules) are used in the implementation
    • Replacement of the Magento built in catalogsearch form with the SLI search form
    • Very fast generation of feeds
    • Optional backup of feeds
    • Optional FTP
    • Scheduling of feed generation
    • Triggering of feed generation via command line interface
    • Support for Parent Child relationships (via associated products and super attributes)
    • Price Ranges on the parent product
    • Inventory information
    • Stock information
    • Multiple, tiered categories per feed
    • Support for advanced price finding mechanisms:
      • Price range on parent products
      • special price with date range
      • Catalog Price Rules (full support, including customer group specific prices)
      • Tiered prices
      • Group/Bundle prices
    • Configurable list of attributes to be added into the feed
